Sentencas: This paper systematically studies Ni doping at Fe sites in La0.6Sr0.4Co0.3Fe0.7O3-delta (LSCF) as an intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (IT-SOFC) electrode.
Titulo: Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite to obtain multifunctional and highly efficient electrocatalytic active IT-SOFC electrode

Sentencas: The electrocatalytic activity of Ni-doped electrodes in oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) and oxygen evolution reaction (OER) modes was analyzed, rather than individual cathode or anode.
Titulo: Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite to obtain multifunctional and highly efficient electrocatalytic active IT-SOFC electrode

Sentencas: The results indicate that Ni doping increases the internal vacancies, ORR activity, and charge transfer ability of La0.6Sr0.4Co0.3Fe0.6Ni0.15O3-delta (LSCFN15).
Titulo: Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite to obtain multifunctional and highly efficient electrocatalytic active IT-SOFC electrode

Sentencas: In addition, compared to LSCF, LSCFN15 also reduces the energy barriers for surface oxygen exchange and bulk diffusion, thereby increasing the overall ORR kinetic rate.
Titulo: Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite to obtain multifunctional and highly efficient electrocatalytic active IT-SOFC electrode

Sentencas: Combined with the distribution of relaxation time (DRT) analysis, it was confirmed that Ni-doped LSCFN15 increased the adsorption and dissociation rates of oxygen.
Titulo: Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite to obtain multifunctional and highly efficient electrocatalytic active IT-SOFC electrode

Sentencas: At 750 degrees C, the area-specific resistance (ASR) of LSCFN15 reached 0.045 omega cm2, which is only 58.4 % of LSCF (0.077 omega cm2).
Titulo: Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite to obtain multifunctional and highly efficient electrocatalytic active IT-SOFC electrode

Sentencas: As a SOFC cathode, the peak power density (PPD) reached 1175 mW cm-2, 1.31 times that of LSCF (898 mW cm-2).
Titulo: Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite to obtain multifunctional and highly efficient electrocatalytic active IT-SOFC electrode

Sentencas: As a SOFC anode, the current exchange density of LSCFN15 in OER mode reaches 164 mA cm-2, which is higher than the 125 mA cm-2 of LSCF, indicating that LSCFN15 also has the potential to serve as an anode for SOFC.
Titulo: Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite to obtain multifunctional and highly efficient electrocatalytic active IT-SOFC electrode

Sentencas: In addition, Ni doping reduces the thermal expansion coefficient of the electrode and improves its thermal compatibility with traditional electrolytes.
Titulo: Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite to obtain multifunctional and highly efficient electrocatalytic active IT-SOFC electrode

Sentencas: As an electrode, LSCFN15 exhibits excellent long-term stability in both SOFC and SOEC modes.
Titulo: Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite to obtain multifunctional and highly efficient electrocatalytic active IT-SOFC electrode

Sentencas: Overall, Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite can improve the ORR and OER activities while enhancing the stability of cell operation and is expected to obtain multifunctional SOFC electrode materials.
Titulo: Ni-doped Fe-based perovskite to obtain multifunctional and highly efficient electrocatalytic active IT-SOFC electrode
